contents.text: Welcome to Scion Staffing, your premier temporary and executive staffing partner in San Francisco.
If you are a job seeker looking for temporary or permanent positions, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a temporary staffing specialist.

navigationGoals: I need a short-term project management role starting next week, please connect me to a temporary staffing specialist.
Find temporary assignments in San Francisco that match my veteran skill set
I’m looking to secure a 6-month contract role as a front-end engineer (React) in the Bay Area.
I need help finding temporary, part-time work to supplement my retirement income.
I need help finding a temporary laboratory technician position in San Francisco this summer.

contents.text: For executive search and career placement, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to an executive search consultant.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for a director-level operations position in finance—connect me to an executive search consultant.
Explore permanent executive career opportunities tailored for veterans
I want to explore executive-level product management opportunities through your career placement service.
I’m interested in exploring senior executive job opportunities in my field.
I’m looking to secure a permanent research associate role with clear advancement opportunities in a tech or R&D firm.

contents.text: If you are an employer seeking to hire contract staff or executive leadership, press '2'.
For contract staffing and temporary workforce solutions, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our contract staffing team.

navigationGoals: I need to hire several contract IT analysts for an upcoming two-month project; please put me through to the contract staffing team.
Hire contract staff for my veteran-owned small business
I need to onboard contract DevOps engineers for a quarterly cloud migration project.
I need to hire temporary support staff for my small business.
I need to hire a contract lab assistant to support my physics research project next month.

contents.text: For executive recruitment and leadership search services, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our executive recruitment department.

navigationGoals: I need to recruit a new CTO for my company—connect me to your executive recruitment department.
Connect with executive recruitment services to fill leadership roles at my veteran-owned company
I’m seeking an executive recruitment partner to identify a VP of Engineering for our scale-up.
I’m looking to recruit an executive leader to manage my company’s operations.
I want to recruit a senior research scientist to lead a new physics initiative in my department.
